titles.title: A bill regarding the suspension of duty on diflunisal.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16768)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 11/20/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the suspension of duty on 2,4-difluoro-4-hydroxy-3-biphenyl-carboxylic acid (also known as diflunisal).
